headline: This free online course introduces you to the world of homeopathy and homeopathic remedies clearly and simply.

It was developed by Dr Samuel Hahnemann two centuries ago and is a system of natural health care. ‘Understanding Homeopathy’ is an introductory course and a perfect opportunity for anybody interested in homeopathy to learn about the subject. It will familiarise you with the world of homeopathy and homeopathic remedies thoroughly.

courseDescription:
People around the globe are frustrated with the results of the conventional system of western medicine. They are also not satisfied with its side effects and cost. Many people are searching for and trying alternative therapies or therapeutic systems that are equally beneficial, less costly and have fewer reactions. This has increased the popularity and acceptance of homeopathy as a system of treating disease naturally and effectively. Homeopathy treats each person as a unique individual and stimulates their healing ability to treat them effectively. A homeopath selects the most appropriate medicine based on the individual's specific symptoms and personal level of health. If you are interested in homeopathy and want to understand its practices and remedies, this course is packed with useful information.

We have divided this course into two modules. We provide you with an in-depth overview of the fundamentals of homeopathy and then explore topics related to human anatomy, their specific diseases and homeopathic remedies. You will discover the history, principles and practices of this unique health system trusted by millions of people around the globe. Once we have outlined the human anatomical system and the most common illnesses related to that system, we will investigate the effective homeopathic remedies for each of them. We will test your knowledge through some engaging assessment questions to make sure you understand the subject matter.

‘Understanding Homeopathy’ is an ideal course for beginners. You will acquire all the necessary facts about the homeopathic system and its medicines. It is of specific help to any layperson, alternative medicine practitioner, paramedic or student who wants to make a career in homeopathy. If you aspire to become a homeopathic practitioner or are curious and eager to learn more about how you can benefit from this fascinating field, then join the course today!
